title: Cesmina Bio
description: Vegan, macrobiotic health food shop in Vinohrady district, 20 metres from the Loving Hut on Londynska. Sells a range of plant-based foods, including cereals, pasta, Japanese ingredients, fresh kosher organic bread, macrobiotic snacks and desserts. Also sells a range of vegan versions of Czech desserts. Re-opened after brief closure per Jun 2014 report.
